abilities.name: Compel
abilities.description: You can Attune to the ghost field to force a nearby ghost to appear and obey a command you give it. You are not supernaturally terrified by a ghost you summon or compel (though your allies may be).

abilities.name: Ghost Mind
abilities.description: You’re always aware of supernatural entities in your presence. Take +1d when you gather info about the supernatural.

abilities.name: Iron Will
abilities.description: You're immune to the terror that some supernatural entities inflict on sight. Take +1d to resistance rolls with Resolve.

abilities.name: Occultist
abilities.description: You know the secret ways to Consort with ancient powers, forgotten gods or demons. Once you've consorted with one, you get +1d to command cultists who worship it.

abilities.name: Ritual
abilities.description: You can Study an occult ritual (or create a new one) to summon a supernatural effect or being. You know the arcane methods to perform ritual sorcery. You begin with one ritual already learned.

abilities.name: Strange Methods
abilities.description: When you invent or craft a creation with arcane features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one arcane design already known

abilities.name: Tempest
abilities.description: You can push yourself to do one of the following: unleash a stroke of lightning as a weapon—summon a storm in your immediate vicinity (torrential rain, roaring winds, heavy fog, chilling frost/snow, etc.).

abilities.name: Warded
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a supernatural consequence, or to push yourself when you deal with arcane forces.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
